GSD.product_version: versions from v5.11 to before v6.0.9
GSD.description:
dmaengine: ti: k3-udma-glue: fix memory leak when register device fail

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.9 by commit 025eab5189fc7ee223ae9b4bc49d7df196543e53, it was introduced in version v5.11 by commit 5b65781d06ea90ef2f8e51a13352c43c3daa8cdc. For more details please see the references link.
